sessions.description: Fuel up and connect! Join us for a networking breakfast with fellow agentic AI and automation professionals before the FUSION keynotes begin. Vegetarian, gluten-free, and dairy-free options are available—just ask.

sessions.title: Agentic ERP: Redefining Enterprise Transformation with UiPath and Deloitte
sessions.speaker: Misa Rawlins (Speaker); Aditi Gupta (Speaker)
sessions.description: Join us to discover how an automation-first, agentic approach can accelerate ERP modernization. UiPath and Deloitte have pioneered the integration of agentic automation into ERP systems, showcasing transformative results. By leveraging UiPath’s advanced automation platform—including RPA, intelligent document processing, and AI-powered orchestration—organizations can streamline data migration, improve integrations, and eliminate manual bottlenecks. This approach enhances operational efficiency and scalability, while enabling autonomous management of complex workflows and AI-driven decision-making. Learn how intelligent automation is redefining ERP modernization and paving the way for future-proof enterprise systems.

sessions.title: Bot or Not? The Curious Case of the Agent Takeover
sessions.speaker: Vivek Sinha  (Speaker)
sessions.description: Are bots a threat or a tool? As AI agents evolve from simple scripts to sophisticated collaborators, the line between human and machine is blurring. This session, led by Vivek Sinha, Head of Sales, Infosys Topaz, explores the agent takeover phenomenon. We'll delve into how AI is augmenting human capabilities, from sales and customer service to creative tasks. Discover the opportunities and challenges of a co-existent workforce, where bots handle the routine while humans focus on strategy and innovation. Join us to uncover the future of work and learn how to thrive in an era where the bot is your best colleague.

sessions.title: Making Agentic AI Work for You – Tying Solutions to Strategic Business Problems
sessions.speaker: Nitin More (Speaker)
sessions.description: Agentic AI is transforming how enterprises tackle strategic challenges - moving beyond automation to autonomous decision-making. Join us for an engaging breakfast session to explore how agentic AI can be purposefully deployed to solve high-impact business problems, from streamlining operations to enhancing customer experiences. We'll walk through real-world use cases, discuss how to align AI capabilities with business goals, and share frameworks that ensure measurable success. No matter what stage of the journey you and your organization are at, join us to share insights, discuss examples, and create collaboration points that will shape the future of intelligent enterprise solutions.

sessions.title: The Agentic-Powered GBS: Painful Truths and Aha! Moments.
sessions.speaker: Lalitha Kompella (Speaker)
sessions.description:
The journey to an agentic-powered GBS is paved with unexpected challenges that consulting slide decks rarely mention. This session deliver an unvarnished, “from the trenches” look at the painful truths you’ll face in your processes, your people and the culture – and the critical “aha!” moments that will ultimately lead to breakthrough success. This session is for leaders who want to move beyond the hype. It's a pragmatic, honest, and actionable guide that will save you months of struggle by learning from the mistakes and breakthrough of early adopters. 

Join us to learn how to:

•Rethink “standard” processes – Why most are not truly standardized and how AI-first redesign can fix hidden inefficiencies.
•Redefine your workforce – Why hybrid business–AI talent is the new imperative, and how to upskill for impact.
•Shift the metrics that matter – Move beyond FTE savings; measure resilience, error reduction, and agility instead.
•Adopt a readiness mindset – Continuous experimentation and adaptive governance are the only way to keep pace with Agentic AI.

sessions.speaker: Taqi Jaffri (Speaker); Mateus Salomao (Speaker); Timothy Corbett (Speaker); Zach Eslami (Speaker)
sessions.description: WEX Inc. used UiPath’s low-code Agent Builder to transform contact center operations by automating email-based service requests, particularly around denied claims. Emails are classified with UiPath Communications Mining, then passed to AI agents and workflows that extract context, identify denial reasons, and generate draft responses. Orchestrated via UiPath Maestro, this solution reduces average handle time (AHT), improves customer satisfaction (CSAT), and is positioned to save over $1M annually. In this session, WEX shares how they built and deployed these agents, the orchestration between humans, robots, and agents, and lessons learned in scaling agentic automation across functions like AML reporting and customer profiling.

sessions.room: Upper Level, Agentic Arena, How-To Theater
sessions.speaker: Taqi Jaffri (Speaker); Daniela Rosenstein (Speaker); Eusebiu Jecan (Speaker)
sessions.description: Cato Networks implemented agentic automation with UiPath Coded Agents (Python) to transform customer support operations. By automating the classification of inbound Zendesk tickets and autonomously resolving common inquiries, Cato reduced resolution times, minimized manual work, and improved consistency across responses — directly enhancing the customer experience. This session explores how they built their coded agent, the challenges encountered, and lessons learned while deploying an automation that touches customers at scale.

sessions.title: The Agentified Contact Center: How WEX, Southern California Edison, and Evergen Are Elevating Customer Experience
sessions.room: Main Level, FUSION Advantage, Latour Ballroom 1-4
sessions.speaker: Bob Sacunas (Moderator); Emily Krohne (Speaker); Carlos Miranda (Speaker); Alfred Ochoa (Speaker)
sessions.description:
Customers today expect fast, personalized answers. Industry leaders like WEX, SCE, and Evergen are showing how agentic automation helps make that possible in the contact center—each in their own way. From accelerating email replies in financial services, to guiding agents through complex utility billing conversations, to matching patients with donor tissue faster in healthcare, they’re finding smarter ways to meet rising expectations.




Join the session to hear their stories, lessons learned, and ideas you can run with to unlock insights and scale success for your customers.

sessions.title: Agentic Automation in Action: Deloitte’s UiPath Journey
sessions.room: Main Level, FUSION Advantage, Latour Ballroom 1-4
sessions.speaker: Aditi Gupta (Speaker); Alexa Jackson (Speaker)
sessions.description: Deloitte’s automation journey is powered in part by UiPath technology, transforming how consulting firms can drive efficiency and innovation with AI. Join us for an inside look at how agentic automations are helping us boost agility and build strategic integration. We’ll share the role UiPath plays in automating SAP upgrades by analyzing business processes and their extensions; enhancing reliability and communication for Autonomous Deployment; and streamlining quality assurance through Deloitte’s Ascend Test AI. Don’t miss this chance to explore real-world applications that showcase the value and versatility of automation with UiPath.

sessions.room: Upper Level, Agentic Arena, How-To Theater
sessions.speaker: Taqi Jaffri (Speaker); Thach Nguyen (Speaker); Daniel Lerner (Speaker)
sessions.description: HUB International is using UiPath IXP (Intelligent Xtraction & Processing) to streamline document-centric workflows at scale. This session outlines how IXP can be applied to high-volume intake, classification, extraction, validation, and downstream automation, and how HUB is approaching an enterprise-grade rollout. We’ll cover the target processes, the build approach with IXP, orchestration with robots and humans-in-the-loop, and lessons learned.

sessions.title: Deploying Advanced Conversational Agents with UiPath
sessions.room: Upper Level, Agentic Arena, How-To Theater
sessions.speaker: Taqi Jaffri (Speaker); Vanitha Preston (Speaker); Tuan Nguyen (Speaker)
sessions.description: CSL Behring’s Plasma Medical Quick Search (PMQS) is a conversational RAG-based agent built with UiPath Autopilot and Agent Builder to support donor eligibility decisions at plasma centers. Piloted at 95%+ response accuracy and scaling to 2,000 users across 330 locations, PMQS delivers policy-grounded answers from SOPs while keeping humans in the loop.

sessions.title: Two Paths to Agentic Automation: Strategies and Insights from Clorox and UiPath
sessions.room: Main Level, FUSION Advantage, Latour Ballroom 1-4
sessions.speaker: Dana Forfa (Speaker); Zeth Baker (Speaker)
sessions.description: This joint session brings together two leading brands to explore a shared playbook for building and scaling agentic automation. While Clorox and UiPath began their journeys from different starting points—one focused on creating a governance-driven blueprint for expansion, the other on executing high-impact use cases—both have applied the same core principles: thoughtful use case selection, strong governance, measurable outcomes, and a vision for enterprise-wide adoption. Together, they will share how these principles translate into scalable, well-governed agentic automation programs that drive real business value, offering practical guidance attendees can put into action.

sessions.title: Building Intelligent SAP Test Data Automation Agents Using UiPath: Agentic AI for Dynamic Enterprise Resource Planning
sessions.speaker: Mangesh Pohanerkar (Speaker)
sessions.description:
Breakfast is available at Avize 2—please pick up your meal and bring it to the session room to enjoy. 

Modern enterprises face challenges in SAP test data preparation, often requiring manual intervention when automated processes encounter missing materials, insufficient inventory, or incomplete master data. We’ll explore using UiPath's agentic AI capabilities to create autonomous agents that intelligently navigate complex SAP scenarios. Through UiPath's AI Center, Orchestrator, and native SAP activities, these agents implement multi-robot coordination, pattern recognition, and adaptive learning systems. The approach reduces manual test data preparation efforts while maintaining enterprise-grade governance. Focus areas include real-world architecture patterns, ML model integration, and implementation strategies for self-learning automation agents that dynamically adapt to SAP's complexity and evolving business requirements.

sessions.title: Making Agentic AI Work for You – Tying Solutions to Strategic Business Problems
sessions.speaker: Nitin More (Speaker)
sessions.description:
Breakfast is available at Avize 2—please pick up your meal and bring it to the session room to enjoy.

Agentic AI is transforming how enterprises tackle strategic challenges - moving beyond automation to autonomous decision-making. Join us for an engaging breakfast session to explore how agentic AI can be purposefully deployed to solve high-impact business problems, from streamlining operations to enhancing customer experiences. We'll walk through real-world use cases, discuss how to align AI capabilities with business goals, and share frameworks that ensure measurable success. No matter what stage of the journey you and your organization are at, join us to share insights, discuss examples, and create collaboration points that will shape the future of intelligent enterprise solutions.

sessions.title: The Self-Assembling Operations: AI-First Process Redesign
sessions.speaker: Marek A Sowa (Speaker)
sessions.description:
Breakfast is available at Avize 2—please pick up your meal and bring it to the session room to enjoy. 

We are on the cusp of a digital leap: moving from automating existing processes to a future where stating a business goal is enough—AI systems design, build, and run the optimal process. This session introduces Intent-to-Outcome and shows how goal- and persona-driven architectures enable scalable, intelligent operations. We’ll also explore the new role of human leadership in a world where the “how” is increasingly handled by AI. 

Key takeaways:

•Shift from process mining to goal-driven, adaptive operations
•Design AI agents around goals & personas for scale
•Redefine leadership: focus on why/what, guide AI with strategy & ethics

sessions.title: Cross-Industry Panel Discussions: Orchestrating People, Strategy and Technology to Amplify ROI
sessions.speaker: Caleb Jones (Speaker); Bob Sacunas (Speaker); Siddharth Shah (Speaker); Vinay Gangidi (Speaker); Aaron Goodrich (Speaker); Flosshilda Labrado (Speaker); Brian Lucas (Speaker); Steven Reid (Speaker); Alfred Ochoa (Speaker); Pavan Thodupunoori (Speaker); Julie Woods (Speaker); Noble Sandlin (Speaker); Patrick Simmons (Speaker); Shane Elliott (Speaker)
sessions.description:
9:00 - Welcome

Join Caleb Jones, UiPath Strategic Engagement Executive, for a brief welcome and introduction of the panel participants ad topic.

9:05 - Breaking Silos: Intelligent Process Optimization 

This panel brings together leaders who’ve transformed operations in finance, legal, and marketing using agentic automation. Hear how they’ve deployed AI-driven solutions that stay compliant and still deliver real ROI in highly regulated spaces. Discover how to spot high-impact opportunities and build unified strategies for end-to-end process transformation.  

9:50 - Break

10:00 - Welcome

10:05 - Seamless CX: The Agentic Customer Journey 

See how top organizations are using agentic automation to reimagine customer experiences. Leaders will share how AI agents are helping personalize interactions, simplify service, and stay one step ahead of customer needs. Learn how they’re combining smart automation with the human touch—and building systems that get better with every interaction.  

10:50 - Break

11:00 - Welcome

11:05 - Intelligent Quality Assurance: The New Rules in Test Automation 

With software complexity on the rise, autonomous AI agents are changing the game in QA. Experts will show how agentic testing strategies bring together human insight and AI speed to boost test coverage and shorten feedback loops. Get practical tips on plugging agentic testing into your CI/CD pipelines and scaling smart testing frameworks that grow with your needs.

sessions.title: FUSION Financial Services Summit: Delivering Transformative Business Value Today
sessions.speaker: Rajat Kalia (Speaker); Emily Krohne (Speaker); Jairo Quiros (Speaker); Amin Kermali (Speaker); Andrew Szabo (Speaker); Paru Puttanna (Speaker); Andrea Simpson (Speaker); Eric Bouchard (Speaker); Janna Riggle (Speaker); Smriti Gupta (Speaker); James Dickson (Speaker); Eric Streem (Speaker); Betty Kim (Speaker); Andrea Willemse (Speaker); Jackson Hounsell (Speaker)
sessions.description:
Explore how leading financial services organizations are scaling automation and AI to solve complex challenges and deliver value across the enterprise—without waiting for specialized talent or new infrastructure. This summit dives into real-world examples of how agentic automation delivers measurable outcomes in compliance, customer experience, onboarding, and more. With a full lineup of live demos, candid leadership discussions from your financial services industry peers, and production-ready stories, you’ll leave with clear strategies and proven approaches to accelerate transformation using the resources you already have.

9:00 - Welcome and Housekeeping

Kick off the day with key themes: AI, automation, and transformation in financial services, plus an overview of sessions and how to engage.

9:05 - Tech Showcase: “Orchestrating the Path to Production: Agentic Automation for Scale" 

Guided by Accenture and rooted in demonstrable visual demos: This session will first provide an overview of the changing automation landscape, and then, using a real-world demo, showcase how agentic automation unlocks new possibilities for operational efficiency, customer experience, and compliance in financial services. 

9:35 - Executive Fireside Chat: Built to Scale: Operationalizing AI and Agentic Automation 

A candid conversation on what it takes to scale AI and automation across the enterprise, with lessons in technology alignment, strategy, and execution. 

10:05 - Panel: From RPA to Agentic – Leading the Organizational Shift 

This panel brings together senior automation leaders to share how their organizations are evolving from structured RPA to intelligent, agentic automation. We’ll explore lessons learned, organizational hurdles, and strategic plays that helped them win executive buy-in and drive adoption.

10:35 - Spotlights: Production-Ready Stories 

These 10-minute customer spotlight sessions will highlight real-world, production-grade deployments of agentic automation. Presenters will walk through specific challenges, implementation approaches, and measurable business results. 

11:10 - Commercial Lending QA/QC - Product Launch

11:30 - How are AI and Automation Teams Coming Together 

As AI initiatives gain momentum across financial institutions, many remain siloed from the RPA and automation programs that could help them scale. This session explores how organizations are evolving their operating models to bring AI and automation teams together—eliminating redundancy, accelerating time to value, and delivering unified business impact. 

11:50 - Closing Remarks / Awards 

The final session will tie together key themes from the day—agentic automation, business transformation, and the power of convergence. We’ll reflect on the most resonant insights, acknowledge standout contributions, and preview what comes next for our financial services community.

sessions.title: Healthcare Payer Summit: The New Agentic Power Grid for Health Plans
sessions.speaker: Jason Bui (Speaker); Derek Spicer (Speaker); Neil Kalmes (Speaker); Prasoon Shrivastava (Speaker); Dan Deschamps (Speaker); Jayaprakash Padiyar (Speaker); Rohit Bachal (Speaker); Gary Grena (Speaker); Avery Rodriguez (Speaker); Joseph Rumpza (Speaker)
sessions.description:
Payers today are navigating one of the most complex operating environments in healthcare history—balancing rising costs, growing regulatory pressure, and sky-high member expectations. 

It’s clear: outdated systems and fragmented processes can’t keep up.

This year, we introduce the new agentic power grid for payers — a connected, intelligent infrastructure that transforms how payer organizations operate, decide, and serve. Agentic automation is at the heart of this shift: autonomous digital agents that can adapt, optimize, and orchestrate in real time across the payer ecosystem.

At this summit, we bring to life a new kind of operational power — one fueled by:

•Community: A network of forward-thinking payer leaders sharing strategies to manage complexity, improve agility, and deliver better outcomes.
•Content: Bold ideas and real-world success stories that show what happens when payers automate not just tasks, but end-to-end decisions.
•Consultation: Expert guidance to help your organization plug into the agentic grid—simplifying prior auth, accelerating claims, reducing risk, and transforming member experiences.
With the right architecture, organizations are not only modernizing operations but also unlocking rapid, measurable ROI from their investments in agentic automation.

It’s time to plug into a different model for payer operations for precision, scale, and resilience.

Welcome to the grid.

9:00 - The Autonomy Uplink: Where Payers Are Headed with UiPath

We'll kick things off with a high-voltage overview of big ideas and big customer wins. 

9:30 - Live Currents: Payer Voices from the Agentic Grid

Get inspired by payer organizations who are actively building agentic automation programs around major use cases. With solo presentations and a panel of business leaders and automation experts, you'll leave with plenty of energy and insights to power your agentic strategy. 

11:00 - GridOps LIVE: Inside the Agentic Engine

The most innovative use cases, the best in agentic technology--UiPath engineers will set the stage on fire with live demos.

sessions.title: Healthcare Provider Summit: The New Agentic Power Grid for Healthcare Providers
sessions.speaker: Phillip Merrell (Speaker); Sameer Sethi (Speaker); Jennifer Wetzel (Speaker); Emily Traupman (Speaker); Jenn Roth (Speaker); Joseph M Gannuscio (Speaker); Chris M Franciskovich (Speaker); Ajay Mansukhani (Speaker); Maggie Walder (Speaker); Chris Jordan (Speaker); James Prospero (Speaker); Raj Iyer (Speaker); Arkesh Patel (Speaker)
sessions.description:
Provider organizations are under immense pressure — labor shortages, clinician burnout, rising costs, and administrative overload are straining the entire system. To deliver better care and create sustainable operations, we need more than automation. We need intelligence, adaptability, and orchestration.

Welcome to the New Agentic Power Grid for Providers — a dynamic infrastructure powered by intelligent automation that doesn’t just perform tasks but understands context, responds to change, and elevates human potential across clinical and operational workflows.

At this summit, we’re building that grid together — with a focus on:

•Community: A collaborative network of healthcare leaders and changemakers redefining what’s possible in modern care delivery.
•Content: Breakthrough ideas and case studies showing how agentic automation reduces administrative burden, improves throughput, and supports overextended teams.
•Consultation: Direct access to experts who help providers plug into the agentic grid to streamline revenue cycle, enhance care coordination, reduce denials, and drive clinician satisfaction.
More than transformation, this is acceleration — with organizations across the care continuum already achieving fast, measurable ROI on their agentic automation investments.

The future of healthcare isn’t just connected — it’s orchestrated.

 Welcome to the grid.

9:00 - Energy Index: Impact to Care Progress Report

We'll kick off with a high energy readout of the impact of agentic automation on healthcare providers over the last 12 months.

9:30 - Gridlines: Provider Stories That Connect and Scale

Hear from business and technology leaders on how they've used agentic automation to streamline business operations and spark big outcomes. With solo presentations and a dynamic customer panel, you'll walk away engergized, inspired, and ready to tackle your own agentic vision. 

11:30 - Live from the Grid: Real Provider Solutions in Real Time

The most innovative use cases, the best in agentic technology--UiPath engineers will set the stage on fire with live demos.

sessions.title: Life Sciences Industry Summit: The New Agentic Power Grid for Life Sciences
sessions.speaker: Joe Miles (Speaker); Carlos Miranda (Speaker); Vanitha Preston (Speaker); Aaron White (Speaker); Henry Trinh (Speaker); Gita Malladi (Speaker); Kim Kraus (Speaker); Roel Bosma (Speaker); Patrick L Schott (Speaker)
sessions.description:
Life sciences organizations today face a uniquely complex mission: accelerating innovation while navigating global regulation, cost pressure, and rising expectations for safety, speed, and patient outcomes. The old operating model — siloed, manual, and fragmented — is no longer viable.

At this year’s Life Sciences Summit, we introduce the full agentic power grid — not just automation, but a connected infrastructure of people, technology, and intelligence designed to fuel transformation across the entire life sciences value chain.

This grid is built on four dynamic forces:

1.Agentic Automation: Autonomous digital agents that think, act, and optimize in real time across R&D, regulatory, commercial, and supply chain functions.
2.Community: A vibrant network of pioneering customers sharing strategies, solutions, and success stories from the front lines of change.
3.Consultation: Direct access to UiPath experts who help architect intelligent automation for precision, scale, and compliance in regulated environments.
4.Content: Bold, live sessions that go beyond theory — showcasing real systems, real use cases, and measurable outcomes.
Together, these elements form a powerful new model for how life sciences organizations operate — one that moves from static systems to intelligent flow, from isolated teams to orchestrated networks, and from incremental gains to transformative results.

Welcome to the grid — where life sciences power up.

10:00 - Customer Presentations

11:30 - Customer Panel and Q&A

sessions.room: Up Lvl, Agentic Arena, Speakers' Corner - Teal

The discussion will also highlight the Agentic AI Accelerator, a proven framework that helps enterprises adopt agentic process automation quickly, avoid common pitfalls, and measure the metrics that matter in order to achieve ROI-positive outcomes and scale innovation effectively.

In this session, UiPath Services will share how they are leveraging agents to transform automation outcomes and how you can apply the same approach to achieve measurable impact in your own programs.

sessions.title: The IXP Blueprint: How Equifax Turned a 10-Day Manual Process into a High-Speed, Automated Workflow
sessions.room: Up Lvl, Agentic Arena, Speakers' Corner - Teal
sessions.speaker: Daniel Fernandez (Speaker)
sessions.description:
What happens when an 80% manual process, buried in unstructured documents and taking over 10 days to complete, is mission-critical? For leaders in the data intelligence space, like the JLR team managing complex real estate data from the Quebec Land Register, this challenge is a daily reality. The pressure to deliver accurate, comprehensive property insights faster is immense.
 
 Equifax, a global data and analytics leader, faced this exact scenario. In partnership with Auxis and UiPath, they deployed the game-changing Intelligent Extraction and Processing (IXP) platform to reinvent their property data management. By leveraging IXP's advanced GenAI capabilities, they successfully automated the extraction of over 100 critical data points from highly variable documents, achieving unprecedented speed and accuracy.
 
 Join this session for a deep dive into a real-world implementation that provides a direct blueprint for how the JLR team and other data-driven organizations can achieve similar transformations.
 
 What you'll learn:
 

•The Playbook for Data Experts: Discover the end-to-end strategy for deploying an IXP solution—a model directly applicable to JLR's goal of processing land titles, property profiles, and transaction records with greater efficiency.
•Harnessing GenAI: See how we achieved over 90% extraction confidence on complex data points, a breakthrough for any organization looking to extract reliable intelligence from unstructured real estate documents.
•Driving Business Impact: Learn how this project unlocked significant value—dramatically improve SLAs, reduced operational costs, and flawless data accuracy—offering a competitive advantage for any leader in the property information market.

sessions.title: From Missed Signals to Measurable Savings: Using Intelligent Systems to Expose FWA and Streamline Response
sessions.room: Up Lvl, Agentic Arena, Speakers' Corner - Teal
sessions.speaker: Andrea Merrin (Speaker)
sessions.description: This session reveals how leveraging intelligent systems can dramatically enhance your ability to detect elusive fraud, waste, and abuse patterns often missed by traditional methods. Uncover how to revolutionize operational efficiency, significantly reducing manual efforts and accelerating your response to threats. Learn to unlock substantial cost savings and bolster your organization's reputation and compliance.

sessions.title: Unlocking Enterprise Autonomy Through Agentic Orchestration
sessions.room: Up Lvl, Agentic Arena, Speakers' Corner - Orange
sessions.speaker: Amardeep Modi (Speaker)
sessions.description: Join Amardeep Modi as he explores how Agentic Orchestration helps enterprises move beyond pilots and task-level automation – unlocking autonomy, accelerating impact, and delivering measurable outcomes. He’ll unpack the urgency behind AI and automation, why orchestration is the missing link to scale, and real-world use cases with the KPIs and success factors leaders need to know.

sessions.title: Buchanan's Journey: Transforming Legal Services with UiPath AI and Automation
sessions.room: Up Lvl, Agentic Arena, Speakers' Corner - Orange
sessions.speaker: Alex Phillips (Speaker); Judy Arrigo (Speaker)
sessions.description: In an industry where precision and expertise are paramount, Buchanan is redefining how legal and compliance services are delivered. Join us for a behind-the-scenes look at two transformative UiPath-powered solutions: an Agentic AI automation that drafts litigation responses with speed, accuracy, and consistency, freeing attorneys to focus on higher-value legal judgment; and an I-9 audit automation that rapidly analyzes complex document sets, flags potential compliance risks, and streamlines remediation. Don’t miss this opportunity to see how you can leverage agentic automation to respond faster, work smarter and deliver great business value.

sessions.title: Empowering Life Sciences with Agentic Automation: Driving Operational Efficiency
sessions.room: Up Lvl, Agentic Arena, Speakers' Corner - Teal
sessions.speaker: Bill Engle (Speaker); Shwetang Peshin (Speaker)
sessions.description: CGI showcases agentic automation solutions that enhance operational efficiency in Life Sciences. The session features a deep dive into RIMS agents that streamline IND submissions in Veeva Vault, optimizing regulatory workflows in Life Sciences

sessions.title: AVALON: Agentic Synthetic Test Data for Avaloq — From Hackathon Win to Production at LGT
sessions.room: Up Lvl, Agentic Arena, Speakers' Corner - Teal
sessions.speaker: Johannes Reitermayer (Speaker); Serge Wolf (Speaker); Benjamin Tan (Speaker)
sessions.description: LGT (Johannes Reitermayer) and Infometis (Serge Wolf) share how “AVALON,” the UiPath AgentHack-winning agent, turns test-data bottlenecks in Avaloq into an on-demand, compliant service. We’ll unpack the agentic architecture (Agent Builder + Maestro + coded agents), synthetic-data strategies that avoid PII, and how AVALON fits risk-based testing, Jira workflows, and CI/CD. Expect a live demo, governance patterns for regulated environments, and field lessons—from first pilot to production adoption. Attendees leave with a practical blueprint to stand up their own test-data agent, plus pitfalls to avoid and KPIs to track.

sessions.title: Welcome to Day Two
sessions.room: Upper Level, Agentic Arena, Keynote Theater
sessions.speaker: Ben Fiechtner (Keynote)
sessions.description: Join Ben Fiechtner, President of the Americas, as he kicks off our afternoon keynotes exploring the breakthroughs, trends, and bold moves driving the next wave of agentic AI and automation.

sessions.title: The Impact of Enterprise-Wide Agentic Automation
sessions.room: Upper Level, Agentic Arena, Keynote Theater
sessions.speaker: Erik Brynjolfsson (Speaker)
sessions.description: AI represents the most transformative General Purpose Technology since the Industrial Revolution, with agentic AI having the potential for automating work across enterprises. Early studies found productivity gains of 15-50% for customer service agents, software engineers, and managers, but these micro-level benefits have not yet translated to economy-wide productivity growth, suggesting we are in the early stages of a “productivity J-curve”. Erik will discuss that, to harness AI, enterprises must more strategically deploy AI tools and agents across business processes and establish better measurement frameworks to identify and quantify their rapidly evolving benefits.

sessions.title: The Future of Agentic Automation Experts Panel
sessions.room: Upper Level, Agentic Arena, Keynote Theater
sessions.speaker: Raghu Malpani (Panelist); Erik Brynjolfsson (Panelist); Jairo Quiros (Speaker); Taqi Jaffri (Moderator); Maureen Fleming (Speaker)
sessions.description: Our final keynote is a FUSION highlight. It features a panel of AI experts from different walks of life and, each adding his or her perspectives on the future of agentic automation. We’ll have a tech analyst adding visibility into what she is seeing as industry trends, an academic economist adding visibility into what he is seeing from frontier labs and academia, a customer adding visibility into real world operational realities, and, finally, our CTO adding visibility into where we are going as UiPath. Join us!

sessions.title: FUSION Mingle Dinner
sessions.description: Join us for our FUSION mingle dinner where you can unwind, connect, and reflect with fellow professionals over exquisite cuisine in a relaxed, elegant setting. It’s the perfect finale to a day of inspiration—fueling fresh ideas and forging meaningful connections. network with industry peers, exchange ideas, and build valuable relationships in a relaxed, elegant setting.

sessions.title: Exclusive Evening Experience: Awakening Show at Wynn Las Vegas
sessions.description:
Prepare to be captivated by the mesmerizing Awakening show at Wynn Las Vegas—a stunning fusion of acrobatics, music, and visual artistry that promises to inspire and awe.

This exclusive event is the perfect blend of business and entertainment, designed to spark new conversations and leave a lasting impression. Don’t miss this opportunity to engage, unwind, and experience one of Las Vegas’s most acclaimed performances.

sessions.title: Breakfast
sessions.description: Fuel up and connect! Join us for a networking breakfast with fellow agentic AI and automation professionals before Agentic Labs begin. Vegetarian, gluten-free, and dairy-free options are available—just ask.

sessions.description: Check in at registration to unlock your full FUSION experience. Registration is on Level 1, right across from the lounge in the conference area. Want to stay one step ahead? Download the UiPath Events mobile app and get the inside scoop before the action begins.

sessions.title: Agentic Labs: Agentic Testing Is Here – Meet Test Cloud
sessions.speaker: Michael Leroux (Speaker); Vikram Parolkar (Speaker); Brian Foster (Speaker)
sessions.description:
Get hands-on with UiPath Test Cloud and discover how agentic testing is changing the rules of QA. In this interactive lab, you’ll:

•Use Autopilot for Testers to accelerate test case ideation and automation
•Experience conversational test development powered by AI
•Explore Test Data Management to provision, govern, and scale test data
•Build self-healing test automations for apps, mobile, and system migration
•Walk away with your first AI-powered test automation and see how fast you can break the bottleneck.
Pre-Requisites: 

Bring your laptop and be ready to build. Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.

sessions.title: Agentic Labs: Build Enterprise-Grade AI Agents with UiPath, a Low-Code Workshop
sessions.speaker: Zach Eslami (Speaker); Scott Schoenberger (Speaker); Kevin Bernstein (Speaker)
sessions.description:
Bring the power of AI agents to your automation workflows in this hands-on, low-code workshop. Learn the complete agent development lifecycle: discover agents from existing Process Maps or templates, configure prompts and tools, evaluate performance with Agent Score and Autopilot, and deploy as automation workflows. Perfect for automation developers, process analysts, and anyone looking to add AI capabilities to their UiPath solutions—no coding experience required.  

*We are running this workshop twice to ensure attendees can join.

Pre-Requisites: 

Bring your laptop and be ready to build. Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.

sessions.description:
Package, publish, and deploy python-coded agents with UiPath. In this hands-on workshop, experts will guide attendees through how to get started quickly with UiPath code samples, including ready-to-use code snippets and templates that showcase automation patterns, integrations, and scenarios.

Pre-Requisites:

sessions.title: Agentic Labs: Data-Driven Agentic Process Optimization with UiPath Process Intelligence
sessions.speaker: Steve Tegeler (Speaker); Brad Barbee (Speaker); James Newman (Speaker)
sessions.description:
This hands-on workshop walks you through the discovery stages of implementing process intelligence with UiPath, from initial process discovery to analysis, optimization, and continuous monitoring.

Workshop highlights:

•Process discovery experience: Participants will work with UiPath Process Mining to uncover hidden process patterns, identify bottlenecks, and discover opportunities to improve processes with Maestro and automation
•Data-driven process mapping: Learn how to automatically construct accurate process maps using real data and import them into Maestro to visualize your actual as-is processes
•Discovery-to-insights workflow: Master the complete discovery workflow from data extraction to actionable insights that can be leveraged within Maestro
You'll learn how to:

•Extract valuable insights from your process data to identify inefficiencies and automation opportunities
•Build comprehensive process maps that visualize your actual workflows and can be imported into Maestro
•Implement discovery dashboards to track process KPIs and performance metrics
•Drive data-informed process improvement decisions across your organization
•Identify high-value automation candidates through process analysis for Maestro implementation
•Get started with process intelligence at your organization
Workshop focus:

We'll focus on enabling you to transform raw process data into actionable discovery insights that drive real business value. By the end, you'll know how to leverage process intelligence capabilities with Maestro to discover process inefficiencies and identify automation opportunities, while maximizing efficiency, compliance, and business outcomes.  

Pre-Requisites: 

Bring your laptop and be ready to build. Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.

sessions.title: Agentic Labs: Hands-On with API Workflows: From APIs to Automations
sessions.speaker: Gunter De Souter (Speaker); Guy Van Wert (Speaker); Ramsay Grove (Speaker)
sessions.description:
APIs are the connective tissue of the enterprise and when transformed into deterministic workflows, they become the foundation of reliable, agentic automation. In this lab, you’ll go hands-on to design and build API Workflows that give agents, robots, and people direct access to enterprise systems, real-time data, and end-to-end business logic.

You’ll learn how to create automations that are secure, scalable, and easily extended: reusing standardized data objects instead of duplicating them, connecting through prebuilt and custom connectors, and extending to any application across your enterprise. By the end, you’ll have built your own API-first automations as a practical building block of the automation backbone for the Agentic Enterprise.

What you’ll learn:

•How agents and robots can use APIs to interact reliably with enterprise systems
•How to design scalable, secure API-first automations using API Workflows
•How to tap into systems fast using prebuilt or custom connectors
•How to give agents real-time access to clean, unified data with Data Fabric
•How to build your own MCP Server using the tools and automations you've used during the lab
Pre-Requisites: 

Bring your laptop and be ready to build something agents can use immediately. Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.

IXP turns all document and communications data into insight and action at speed and scale. This workshop focuses on the new 'Generative extraction for unstructured and complex documents capability'. sessions.speaker: Mounish Kothapally (Speaker); Anvita Dekhane (Speaker); Robert Love (Speaker)
sessions.description:
This hands-on workshop walks you through every stage of creating a working agentic process with UiPath Maestro. From initial process design to deployment, monitoring, and continuous improvement.

You’ll learn how to:

•Model processes that combine multiple agents, people, and automation tools
•Manage live instances and handle escalations
•Monitor performance and identify optimization opportunities
We’ll focus on enabling you to make agents reliable, safe, and scalable in real-world processes. By the end, you’ll know how to integrate agentic capabilities into your existing development workflow without sacrificing control, performance, or maintainability.

sessions.speaker: Michael Leroux (Speaker); Vikram Parolkar (Speaker); Brian Foster (Speaker)
sessions.description:
Take your agentic testing skills to the next level in this advanced lab. You’ll:

•Supercharge your Agentic Testing strategy with load and performance testing
•Leverage Agent Builder to design testing agents that scale across apps and systems to deliver speed, scalability, and nonstop quality
•Incorporate continuous testing directly into your CI/CD pipelines
By the end, you’ll have hands-on experience with performance testing, CI/CD-integrated continuous testing, and building agents with Agent Builder — three essential skills to shape the future of QA.

sessions.title: Agentic Labs: Hands-On with Agentic RPA: From Interfaces to Resilient Automations
sessions.speaker: Alexandru Roman (Speaker); Andrei Oros (Speaker)
sessions.description:
User interfaces evolve constantly and fragile automations can’t keep up. In this interactive lab, you’ll build UI automations with ScreenPlay, the adaptive agent that navigates changes, responds to natural-language prompts, and delivers reliability across every surface.

You’ll see how Healing Agent keeps automations running through self-healing, and how Autopilot accelerates the way you design resilient workflows. Most importantly, you’ll put cross-platform automation into practice - building automations that run seamlessly across Windows and macOS. By the end, you’ll leave with hands-on experience creating UI automations that are faster to build, resilient to change, and ready for the agentic enterprise.

Bring your laptop and be ready to build. Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.

sessions.title: Accelerating Innovation in Life Sciences with Agentic Automation: CGI’s Vision and Real-World Impact
sessions.speaker: William A Engle (Speaker)
sessions.description: CGI shares real-world applications of agentic automation that improve efficiency and outcomes. The session features a deep dive into RIMS agents that streamline IND submissions in Veeva Vault, optimizing regulatory workflows in Life Sciences.

sessions.title: Agentic AI in Action: Unlocking Document Intelligence Across the Enterprise
sessions.speaker: Vinny Larocca (Speaker)
sessions.description: Every industry struggles with the flood of unstructured documents that slow down operations and decision making. From contracts and invoices to claims and compliance reports, businesses need more than extraction, they need action. Join Lydonia as we discuss how Agentic AI transforms document workflows into decision ready intelligence. We will explore use cases including contract review, invoice processing, claims handling, and customer onboarding, and share how organizations are using AI agents to accelerate outcomes, improve compliance, and unlock new levels of efficiency.

sessions.title: Agentic AI: From Hype to Hands-On
sessions.speaker: Jacob Ortega (Speaker)
sessions.description: Is your organization ready to get started with Agentic AI? In this roundtable, we will explore how to choose the right first steps, avoid common pitfalls, and learn from the experiences of early adopters who are already demonstrating measurable value. Drawing from a proven framework for jumpstarting adoption, you will see how organizations are moving from experimentation to impact in just weeks through hands-on enablement, targeted use case discovery, and a clear roadmap for scale. Walk away with practical ideas, best practices, and actionable steps to accelerate Agentic AI in your own organization.

sessions.title: Agentic Automation: When Processes Think for Themselves
sessions.speaker: Nishant Khare (Speaker)
sessions.description: What if your workflows could sense, decide, and act without waiting for a human nudge? Discover how Agentic Process Automation is reshaping enterprise operations by blending AI, RPA, and decision intelligence into self-steering digital agents.

sessions.title: Agentic ERP: The Power of Autonomous Intelligence
sessions.speaker: Mrawlins (Speaker)
sessions.description: Join us for a roundtable exploring how agentic AI is revolutionizing ERP systems. As organizations seek smarter, more adaptive ways for Agentic AI to transform the future of work, both ERP implementations and business operations can benefit from UiPath’s advanced automation platform. We’ll discuss how UiPath’s agentic capabilities go beyond traditional automation, allowing intelligent systems to learn, reason, and collaborate in optimizing business processes. Whether you’re curious about the technology, its business impact, or practical implementation, this session is your chance to share experiences, ask questions, and discover what’s next for ERP in the age of AI.

sessions.title: Agentic Intelligence: The New Edge for Smarter Processes and Smarter Outcomes
sessions.description: Discover how Agentic Process Orchestration combines AI, and decision intelligence to create self-optimizing workflows that sense, decide, and act autonomously. This session explores how enterprises can move beyond static automation to orchestrate intelligent, adaptive processes that deliver agility and superior business outcomes.

sessions.title:
Agentic Process Management (APM) : Operational Harmony Between Humans and 
Machines
sessions.speaker: Steve Lavalle (Speaker)
sessions.description: Process Management as a discipline refers to systematic identification, design, execution, operations and ongoing improvements to business processes. Most business leaders understand BPM or Business Process Management. In today’s AI-powered reality, the convergence of software agents, digital robots and emerging AI technology transformational in nature, a new process management discipline has been born. Introducing APM, Agentic Process Management by WonderBotz CEO, Steve LaValle.

sessions.title: Agents in Use by UiPath MVPs
sessions.speaker: Atiwari (Speaker); Tracy Dixon (Speaker)
sessions.description: See how UiPath MVPs are already experimenting with and using agents in real scenarios. From early use cases with UiPath Agent Builder and Maestro to lessons learned in design and deployment, this roundtable offers a chance to hear firsthand experiences. This roundtable is your chance to engage in open discussion on challenges, opportunities, and creative ways agents can drive value in business and automation journeys.

sessions.title: Autonomous Testing: Redefining Speed and Precision
sessions.speaker: Sauaggarwal (Speaker)
sessions.description: Join us for an engaging discussion on AI-driven test automation, where Deloitte and UiPath are leading the way. In today's fast-paced world, Deloitte has built an Autonomous Test solution to help our clients accelerates their test design, execution and management activities on projects. This has enabled higher test coverage, faster time to value, reduced client effort and less disruption to our clients. We'll explore how AI and shift-left methodologies are transforming the testing process—making it more accurate, reducing defects, and expanding coverage. Discover how agentic automation is not just a buzzword but a practical tool that speeds up testing and boosts efficiency.

sessions.title: Azure Marketplace
sessions.speaker: Aaron Casano (Speaker)
sessions.description: As the enterprise software landscape evolves, the marketplace is no longer just a transactional storefront—it’s a strategic engine for growth, innovation, and collaboration. This roundtable will explore the renewed relevance of marketplaces in 2025 and beyond, drawing from Microsoft’s commercial marketplace transformation and UiPath’s enterprise-grade automation ecosystem. We’ll examine how Microsoft’s unified marketplace strategy—consolidating AppSource and Azure Marketplace into a single commerce backbone—enables partners to scale globally, co-sell with Microsoft’s field teams, and unlock cloud spend. From multiparty private offers to AI agent monetization, the marketplace is now central to how software is discovered, deployed, and monetized. Whether you’re a buyer, vendor, or partner, join us to rethink the marketplace—not as a buzzword, but as a business imperative.

sessions.title: Balancing AI Learning with Delivery and Transformation in the Agentic Era
sessions.speaker: Kyung (Speaker)
sessions.description:
Competing priorities of delivery, transformation, and preparing for the work of the future is resulting in a shift in skills focus. Delivering on shifting priorities requires a combination of technical training, AI upskilling, and future proofing programs:

•Cross-training: Helps us have the right skills to deliver
•AI upskilling: Creates the skills required to work with and build the future platforms
•Enduring skills: Gives talent skills for their evolving roles

sessions.title: Beyond the ROI: Building Business Cases for Automation and AI That Truly Resonate
sessions.speaker: Matthew Rutkowski (Speaker)
sessions.description: As automation evolves from traditional RPA to advanced AI and agentic technologies, the way we build business cases must evolve too. It’s no longer just about efficiency and cost savings—organizations must also consider less tangible benefits like adaptability, knowledge capture, and innovation enablement, as well as venturing into value creation. In this roundtable, we’ll explore how to craft business cases that balance hard financials with the nuanced value drivers of AI-powered automation, equipping you with strategies to communicate a more holistic value story to your stakeholders.

sessions.title: Breaking Barriers: Navigating Agentic Automation in Healthcare
sessions.speaker: Jrouse (Speaker)
sessions.description: Join Jacob Rouse, VP of Innovation, Healthcare at Naviant, for an insightful roundtable on why healthcare leaders hesitate to embrace agentic automation. While this technology holds the potential to significantly enhance both payer and provider operations, its implementation is often impeded by various challenges. These include concerns over data privacy, integration complexities, workforce resistance, and uncertain ROI. Together, we will examine these obstacles and explore practical strategies to overcome them. Our goal is to leverage intelligent automation to improve patient care and streamline administrative processes.

sessions.title: Co-Innovation Between MSFT and UiPath to Jointly Accelerate Agentic Automation
sessions.speaker: Tifang (Speaker)
sessions.description: Microsoft and UiPath are redefining agentic automation through deep technical integration and strategic alignment. This roundtable explores how bidirectional orchestration between Copilot Studio and UiPath Studio enables agents to trigger automations across platforms, unlocking real-world use cases and driving exponential pipeline growth.

sessions.title: Creating a Self-Sustaining Model That Embeds Agentic Into How People Work
sessions.speaker: Nitin More (Speaker)
sessions.description: Deploying an automation program and engaging employees in the journey will deliver outcomes, but will it drive the results you want? The difference is in "how" it's done for your organization. When integrating agentic AI into your organization, building a "community of practice", that combines engagement and enablement with governance, is essential. As Walt Disney said, "You can design and create, and build the most wonderful place in the world. But it takes people to make the dream a reality."

sessions.title: Creating an Integrated Ecosystem That Seamlessly Connects Your Organization
sessions.speaker: Jagadeesh Kondrajuvenkat (Speaker)
sessions.description: The expansive technology landscape that is AI-powered, agentic automation requires fusing new tech with legacy systems, while identifying best-fit solutions to advance your organization. Balancing these integrations requires a technical prowess combined with an eye on experiences being created. We'll explore a simplified approach to weaving multiple technologies into the fabric of your organization - accelerating the benefits of automation and AI.

sessions.title: FINS: Banking Meet-up
sessions.description: Join other Banking customers for an unhosted roundtable lunch to connect with your peers and share insights.

sessions.title: FINS: Credit Unions Meet-up
sessions.description: Join other Credit Union customers for an unhosted roundtable lunch to connect with your peers and share insights.

sessions.title: FINS: LIfe Insurance Meet-up
sessions.description: Join other Life Insurance customers for an unhosted roundtable lunch to connect with your peers and share insights.

sessions.title: FINS: P&C Insurance Meet-up
sessions.description: Join other Property & Casualty Insurance customers for an unhosted roundtable lunch to connect with your peers and share insights.

sessions.title: FINS: Wealth and Asset Management Meet-up
sessions.description: Join other Wealth and Asset Management customers for an unhosted roundtable lunch to connect with your peers and share insights.

sessions.title: Fast-Track Agentic AI ROI with Proven Best Practices
sessions.speaker: Bill Woodford (Speaker)
sessions.description: Agentic AI is poised to transform how work gets done – but most organizations are stuck in the experimentation phase, struggling to achieve measurable value. Many delivery models aren’t built for this new level of complexity – lacking the flexibility, agility, and deep collaboration needed to operationalize agentic effectively. Dive into best practices that can give your agentic program a strategic edge, closing the execution gap and fast-tracking value realization. Key topics include: • Biggest challenges to achieving agentic value • Why traditional delivery models often struggle • The advantage of nearshore delivery for scaling agentic effectively • Best practices & real-world success stories

sessions.title: Fostering a Culture of Ai-Powered Innovation
sessions.speaker: Prashanth Sivadasan (Speaker)
sessions.description: Innovation is no longer optional for organizations - it's imperative. At the heart of innovation are your employees, who must not only be enabled and empowered, but serve as the driving force for transformation. It's essential that organizations take a people-first approach, when creating a culture of innovation and integrating agentic AI, not just in one area of the organization, but enterprise-wide.

sessions.title: From Flowcharts to Free Will: The Rise of Autonomous Automation
sessions.speaker: Vivek Sinha  (Speaker)
sessions.description: What happens when automation stops following scripts and starts making choices? Let’s dive into the shift from deterministic workflows to autonomous agents that learn, adapt, and evolve, blurring the line between process and intelligence.

sessions.title: How to Think—and Act—Like an AI-Native Business
sessions.speaker: Aditya Rajkondawar (Speaker)
sessions.description: Existing businesses must transform their organization to embed AI and agentic technologies at their core. In order to reap the benefits in the future and position themselves ahead of their competition, organizations must evolve their technology ecosystems and lay the foundation for where they want to be. Companies that start shifting processes today will be the winners tomorrow.

sessions.title: Intelligent Automation Meets Intelligent Assurance
sessions.description: Explore how Quality Engineering and Assurance can keep pace with the speed and intelligence of enterprise automation. Is assurance a bottleneck today or can it become a business accelerator in the intelligent automation journey?

sessions.title: Oil and  Gas Roundtable
sessions.speaker: Gavin Keeler (Speaker)
sessions.description: Stop by for a conversation about agentic automation in oil and gas, including a real-world use case with Continental Resources.

sessions.title: Quote Processing: Agentic Revenue Generation
sessions.speaker: Kyle Kain (Speaker)
sessions.description: In this interactive roundtable, we’ll explore how agentic automation is transforming order intake and quote processing into powerful drivers of revenue growth. Discover how intelligent, autonomous systems can accelerate time-to-quote, increase accuracy, and unlock net-new revenue opportunities by enabling sales teams to respond faster and more competitively. We’ll discuss real-world use cases where agentic solutions have streamlined workflows, reduced manual intervention, and created capacity for higher-value selling activities. Join peers and industry experts to exchange ideas, identify potential applications within your own business, and reimagine how order-to-quote processes can become a strategic lever for agentic revenue generation.

sessions.title: Smart Finance Transformation: Practical Paths to AI-Driven Automation
sessions.speaker: Alexajackson (Speaker)
sessions.description: Join us for this roundtable focused on establishing a successful automation program within your finance organization. We’ll share practical tips on stakeholder education, identifying and prioritizing investments in AI and automation, and key considerations for enterprise-wide AI adoption.

sessions.title: Steps Towards Agentic Automation Community
sessions.speaker: Naveen Aifanatic (Speaker); Priyadarshini  (Speaker)
sessions.description: Join the discussion how the UiPath Community is moving from intelligent automation to agentic automation. UiPath MVPs share their perspectives on the practical steps - learning, experimentation, and collaboration, that can help individuals and organizations prepare for this shift. Together, we'll explore how communities can play a central role in accelerating adoption, sharing best practices, and shaping the future of agentic automation.

sessions.title: The Great BPO Reset: From Labor Arbitrage to “Agentic AI-as-an-Internal-Service”.
sessions.speaker: Lalitha Kompella (Speaker)
sessions.description:
The traditional BPO/GBS model—built on labor arbitrage and FTE-based pricing—is no longer sustainable. The future belongs to Agentic AI-as-a-Service, where configurable AI agents deliver outcomes at fixed prices, internally and at scale. This session offers a bold blueprint to transform service delivery models and reposition the GBS Centre of Excellence (CoE) as the engine of autonomous operations. 

Key takeaways:

•End of FTE models: shift from labor to outcome- driven, AI-native operations
•Build your Agent Factory: GBS CoE as the hub for AI agents
•Adopt a new operating model: platform-driven, blending AI, orchestration & human oversight.

sessions.title: The Great CoE Convergence: How Siloed Governance Will be Brought Together in an Agentic World
sessions.speaker: Aj Hanna (Speaker)
sessions.description: In this roundtable, TQA will share our view on how the dependencies that exist in the way intelligent automation, data, and AI operate and governed will lead to a "great convergence" of siloed activities to maximize the potential Agentic AI.

sessions.speaker: Janette Hausler (Speaker)
sessions.description: Get a first look at how AI25 winners are laying the foundation for agentic automation. Hear how they’re combining agents, robots, and people to drive real business impact—and reimagine what work can be with the UiPath Platform™ at the center.

sessions.description: Get a first look at how AI25 winners are laying the foundation for agentic automation. Hear how they’re combining agents, robots, and people to drive real business impact—and reimagine what work can be with the UiPath Platform™ at the center.

sessions.description: Get a first look at how AI25 winners are laying the foundation for agentic automation. Hear how they’re combining agents, robots, and people to drive real business impact—and reimagine what work can be with the UiPath Platform™ at the center.

sessions.title: Unlocking Agentic Automation in Life Sciences. Intelligent Agents, Smarter Sciences.
sessions.speaker: Cmiranda (Speaker)
sessions.description: Unlock the next era of life sciences with agentic automation. In this interactive roundtable, we’ll explore how generative AI—powered agents are breaking data silos, making autonomous decisions, and accelerating discovery from lab to patient. See how intelligent agents can streamline compliance, speed research, and elevate patient experience—while seamlessly integrating with your existing automation ecosystem. Whether you’re in R&D, manufacturing, or patient services, you’ll leave with fresh ideas and practical strategies to drive smarter, faster, and more impactful operations.

sessions.title: Utilities Industry Roundtable
sessions.speaker: Matt Dussling (Speaker)
sessions.description:
The discussion will hit on two main topics:

1. How to navigate or gain momentum with the Agentic teams and the AI teams that organizations are adding. 

2. Leveraging Agentic, LLM and AI to make the biggest impact for customers and employees.

sessions.title: What Got Chatbots Here Won’t Get You There: Agentic CX That Orchestrates, Not Just Answers
sessions.speaker: Pk (Speaker)
sessions.description: Scripted bots and static flows reduce clicks—but they don’t earn loyalty. This roundtable explores Agentic CX, where domain “expert” agents coordinate across voice, chat, email, and back-office systems to understand intent, take action, and escalate with context. We’ll break down the trust stack—grounded knowledge, policy guardrails, real-time supervision, and outcome telemetry (AHT, FCR, CSAT, containment)—and share field lessons from banking, healthcare, and telecom. We’ll also showcase qubi, qBotica’s modular Agentic CX platform, paired with UiPath’s CX Companion, to layer industry-ready domain packs (e.g., billing, claims, onboarding, collections) without ripping and replacing—for any sector. Expect concrete patterns: journey-aware orchestration, secure account actioning, and AI + human handoffs that feel seamless. We’ll map how UiPath (Agent Builder, CX Companion, Maestro) with qBotica’s playbooks turns pilots into production and moves teams from “answers” to orchestrated outcomes.

sessions.title: You Can’t Scale What You Can’t Trust: Rethinking Test Automation in the Age of Agentic AI
sessions.speaker: Sivaprasanna Vanapalli (Speaker)
sessions.description: In the era of Agentic AI, Test Automation must shift from technical execution to trusted orchestration. This roundtable explores how testers are evolving into AI orchestrators by embedding continuous learning, structured feedback, and intuitive design into their workflows. We’ll discuss how to apply GenAI for test case generation, risk-based prioritization, and faster triage to boost test velocity and coverage with intelligent automation. The session highlights how to drive adoption across teams, balance AI autonomy with human oversight, & scale test strategies that reduce risk and accelerate delivery.

sessions.title: Achieving Success with Government Automation: Key Considerations and Benefits
sessions.speaker: Vhanson (Speaker)
sessions.description: Join VP of Public Sector, Vince Hanson, a 25-year technology and process improvement veteran for an insightful session on Automating Legacy Workflows in Government. This discussion will explore the benefits of intelligent automation across departmental users & processes, address common roadblocks, and highlight key pre- and post-automation considerations. Designed for public sector professionals, this session aims to provide a comprehensive understanding of how automation can enhance efficiency and positive constituency outcomes while acknowledging the human aspect of technological integration.

sessions.title: Adding Agency to Manufacturing
sessions.speaker: Bhavesh Joshi (Speaker)
sessions.description: Agentic automation is elevating operational efficiency to new heights. As intelligent agents learn discernment and begin engaging directly with Business Process Owners, a new convergence of automation and human decision-making is taking shape. Join our supply chain and agentic automation experts for an insightful lunch discussion on how to turn modernization into monetization within Manufacturing Operations.

sessions.title: Agentic AI in Action: Scaling Beyond Automation
sessions.speaker: Ben (Speaker)
sessions.description: Agentic AI is redefining automation by moving beyond static workflows to autonomous, decision-making systems. In this roundtable, Ben Park, CTO of TQA Solutions, will share how enterprises can harness agentic systems to drive agility, efficiency, and scale. We’ll discuss key use cases, the differences from RPA, and how to overcome adoption barriers while shaping enterprise operating models for the next wave of transformation.

sessions.title: Agentic AI in Action: Unlocking Document Intelligence Across the Enterprise
sessions.speaker: Vinny Larocca (Speaker)
sessions.description: Every industry struggles with the flood of unstructured documents that slow down operations and decision making. From contracts and invoices to claims and compliance reports, businesses need more than extraction, they need action. Join Lydonia as we discuss how Agentic AI transforms document workflows into decision ready intelligence. We will explore use cases including contract review, invoice processing, claims handling, and customer onboarding, and share how organizations are using AI agents to accelerate outcomes, improve compliance, and unlock new levels of efficiency.

sessions.title: Agentic AI: From Hype to Hands-On
sessions.speaker: Jacob Ortega (Speaker)
sessions.description: Is your organization ready to get started with Agentic AI? In this roundtable, we will explore how to choose the right first steps, avoid common pitfalls, and learn from the experiences of early adopters who are already demonstrating measurable value. Drawing from a proven framework for jumpstarting adoption, you will see how organizations are moving from experimentation to impact in just weeks through hands-on enablement, targeted use case discovery, and a clear roadmap for scale. Walk away with practical ideas, best practices, and actionable steps to accelerate Agentic AI in your own organization.

sessions.title: Agentic Automation: When Processes Think for Themselves
sessions.speaker: Nishant Khare (Speaker)
sessions.description: What if your workflows could sense, decide, and act without waiting for a human nudge? Discover how Agentic Process Automation is reshaping enterprise operations by blending AI, RPA, and decision intelligence into self-steering digital agents.

sessions.title: Agentic ERP: The Power of Autonomous Intelligence
sessions.speaker: Mrawlins (Speaker)
sessions.description: Join us for a roundtable exploring how agentic AI is revolutionizing ERP systems. As organizations seek smarter, more adaptive ways for Agentic AI to transform the future of work, both ERP implementations and business operations can benefit from UiPath’s advanced automation platform. We’ll discuss how UiPath’s agentic capabilities go beyond traditional automation, allowing intelligent systems to learn, reason, and collaborate in optimizing business processes. Whether you’re curious about the technology, its business impact, or practical implementation, this session is your chance to share experiences, ask questions, and discover what’s next for ERP in the age of AI.

sessions.title: Agentic Intelligence: The New Edge for Smarter Processes and Smarter Outcomes
sessions.description: Discover how Agentic Process Orchestration combines AI, and decision intelligence to create self-optimizing workflows that sense, decide, and act autonomously. This session explores how enterprises can move beyond static automation to orchestrate intelligent, adaptive processes that deliver agility and superior business outcomes.

sessions.title: Agentic Manufacturing
sessions.speaker: Paul Boris (Speaker)
sessions.description: Stop by to continue the conversation with the speakers on the manufacturing summit.

sessions.title: Agentic-Powered Sales to Drive Revenue Growth
sessions.speaker: Bill Woodford (Speaker)
sessions.description: Ready to move beyond Agentic AI pilots and into real impact? Learn how Auxis and UiPath are pushing a major client to the forefront of innovation with an Agentic Digital Sales Assistant – driving smarter decisions, avoiding missed sales opportunities, and transforming customer experiences. Learn how this powerful use case can be applied enterprise-wide. We’ll discuss: • The Auxis Agentic Digital Assistant: Key benefits & how it works • High-value opportunities across your business, from supply chain to customer service • How to identify use cases with the highest ROI and fastest time to value • Best practices for implementation success

sessions.title: Agents in Use by UiPath MVPs
sessions.speaker: Atiwari (Speaker); Tracy Dixon (Speaker)
sessions.description: See how UiPath MVPs are already experimenting with and using agents in real scenarios. From early use cases with UiPath Agent Builder and Maestro to lessons learned in design and deployment, this roundtable offers a chance to hear firsthand experiences. This roundtable is your chance to engage in open discussion on challenges, opportunities, and creative ways agents can drive value in business and automation journeys.

sessions.title: Autonomous Testing: Redefining Speed and Precision
sessions.speaker: Sauaggarwal (Speaker)
sessions.description: Join us for an engaging discussion on AI-driven test automation, where Deloitte and UiPath are leading the way. In today's fast-paced world, Deloitte has built an Autonomous Test solution to help our clients accelerates their test design, execution and management activities on projects. This has enabled higher test coverage, faster time to value, reduced client effort and less disruption to our clients. We'll explore how AI and shift-left methodologies are transforming the testing process—making it more accurate, reducing defects, and expanding coverage. Discover how agentic automation is not just a buzzword but a practical tool that speeds up testing and boosts efficiency.

sessions.title: Azure Marketplace
sessions.speaker: Aaron Casano (Speaker)
sessions.description: As the enterprise software landscape evolves, the marketplace is no longer just a transactional storefront—it’s a strategic engine for growth, innovation, and collaboration. This roundtable will explore the renewed relevance of marketplaces in 2025 and beyond, drawing from Microsoft’s commercial marketplace transformation and UiPath’s enterprise-grade automation ecosystem. We’ll examine how Microsoft’s unified marketplace strategy—consolidating AppSource and Azure Marketplace into a single commerce backbone—enables partners to scale globally, co-sell with Microsoft’s field teams, and unlock cloud spend. From multiparty private offers to AI agent monetization, the marketplace is now central to how software is discovered, deployed, and monetized. Whether you’re a buyer, vendor, or partner, join us to rethink the marketplace—not as a buzzword, but as a business imperative.

sessions.title: Balancing AI Learning with Delivery and Transformation in the Agentic Era
sessions.speaker: Kyung (Speaker)
sessions.description:
Competing priorities of delivery, transformation, and preparing for the work of the future is resulting in a shift in skills focus. Delivering on shifting priorities requires a combination of technical training, AI upskilling, and future proofing programs:

•Cross-training: Helps us have the right skills to deliver
•AI upskilling: Creates the skills required to work with and build the future platforms
•Enduring skills: Gives talent skills for their evolving roles

sessions.description: As enterprises embed AI into business workflows- through chatbots, copilots and intelligent automation – the need for trust has never been greater. This session will explore what role Quality engineering should play in enabling next-gen automation programs.

sessions.title: Creating a Self-Sustaining Model That Embeds Agentic Into How People Work
sessions.speaker: Nitin More (Speaker)
sessions.description: Deploying an automation program and engaging employees in the journey will deliver outcomes, but will it drive the results you want? The difference is in "how" it's done for your organization. When integrating agentic AI into your organization, building a "community of practice", that combines engagement and enablement with governance, is essential. As Walt Disney said, "You can design and create, and build the most wonderful place in the world. But it takes people to make the dream a reality."

sessions.description: The expansive technology landscape that is AI-powered, agentic automation requires fusing new tech with legacy systems, while identifying best-fit solutions to advance your organization. Balancing these integrations requires a technical prowess combined with an eye on experiences being created. We'll explore a simplified approach to weaving multiple technologies into the fabric of your organization - accelerating the benefits of automation and AI.

sessions.title: Demystifying Agentic AI, RPA & Intelligent Automation: What They Are, What to Build, When to Use Them, and How to Scale Beyond the POC
sessions.speaker: Sivaprasanna Vanapalli (Speaker)
sessions.description: In today’s AI landscape, Agentic AI is rapidly becoming the next frontier—but few understand what it really is or how to scale it. This roundtable cuts through the hype to clarify the differences between Agentic AI, Intelligent Automation, Agentic Automation, and RPA. Learn what to build, when to use each technology, how to avoid failure, and how to scale responsibly beyond the POC using real-world governance, frameworks, and delivery strategies.

sessions.description: Innovation is no longer optional for organizations - it's imperative. At the heart of innovation are your employees, who must not only be enabled and empowered, but serve as the driving force for transformation. It's essential that organizations take a people-first approach, when creating a culture of innovation and integrating agentic AI, not just in one area of the organization, but enterprise-wide.

sessions.title: From Chasing Orders to Closing Deals: Building Trusted Sales AI Agents
sessions.speaker: Shwetang Peshin (Speaker)
sessions.description: Sales reps shouldn’t spend their days hopping between ServiceNow, Sales Workbench, and knowledge bases just to answer, “where’s my order?”. During this roundtable, we will unpack how agentic automation anchored by a conversational interface, an AI trust layer, and orchestrated robots can turn reactive sales support into proactive, revenue-driving execution. We will use CGI’s Sales AI Agent as a practical anchor to explore design choices (conversational Autopilot entry points, incident and email automation, order-status lookups), governance patterns (trust, auditability, compliance), and the human-in-the-loop moments that sustain adoption. We will also discuss how to size and track impact, cutting resolution time from minutes to seconds.

sessions.title: From Flowcharts to Free Will: The Rise of Autonomous Automation
sessions.speaker: Vivek Sinha  (Speaker)
sessions.description: What happens when automation stops following scripts and starts making choices? Let’s dive into the shift from deterministic workflows to autonomous agents that learn, adapt, and evolve, blurring the line between process and intelligence.

sessions.title: How to Think—and Act—Like an AI-Native Business
sessions.speaker: Aditya Rajkondawar (Speaker)
sessions.description: Existing businesses must transform their organization to embed AI and agentic technologies at their core. In order to reap the benefits in the future and position themselves ahead of their competition, organizations must evolve their technology ecosystems and lay the foundation for where they want to be. Companies that start shifting processes today will be the winners tomorrow.

sessions.title: Measuring the Impact: Quantifying Agentic AI Use Cases
sessions.speaker: Jwetzel (Speaker)
sessions.description: This roundtable brings together industry leaders to explore practical methods for evaluating the business value of agentic AI solutions. Participants will discuss frameworks, metrics, and real-world examples to assess ROI, efficiency gains, and qualitative benefits. The session will highlight how to move from experimentation to measurable outcomes, enabling organizations to make informed investment decisions. By sharing experiences and best practices, attendees will gain actionable insights into building a strong value case for agentic AI adoption.

sessions.title: No Templates, No Tears: Explainable Gen-Doc Extraction
sessions.speaker: Russ Alfeche (Speaker)
sessions.description:
Templates and OCR got you through structured PDFs; today’s inflow is messy and always changing. This roundtable lays out the production pattern for generative document extraction you can trust: detect → classify → extract → validate → reconcile → learn. 

We’ll unpack field-level confidence, schema-first prompting, lineage/evidence storage, PII guardrails, and human-in-the-loop—plus how to blend LLMs with deterministic checks and UiPath orchestration. Expect hard metrics (STP rate, rework %, days-to-cash) and a clear path from pilot to scale with qBotica DoqumentAI. Bring your horror stories; leave with a blueprint that ships.

sessions.title: Seamless Cx: The Agentic Customer Journey Panel Discussion
sessions.speaker: Bob Sacunas (Speaker)
sessions.description: Meet the speakers from the Seamless Cx: The Agentic Customer Journey panel discussion.

We’ll share practical tips on stakeholder education, identifying and prioritizing investments in AI and automation, and key considerations for enterprise-wide AI adoption.

sessions.speaker: Naveen Aifanatic (Speaker); Priyadarshini  (Speaker)
sessions.description: Join the discussion how the UiPath Community is moving from intelligent automation to agentic automation. UiPath MVPs share their perspectives on the practical steps - learning, experimentation, and collaboration, that can help individuals and organizations prepare for this shift. sessions.title: The Agentic Orchestrate: A CXO’s Blueprint for Governing a Hybrid Workforce of Human, Robots, and AI Agents.
sessions.speaker: Marek A Sowa (Speaker); Ramana Bhandaru (Speaker)
sessions.description:
Agentic AI is reshaping the workforce into a hybrid ecosystem of humans, software robots, and autonomous AI agents. For CXOs, the challenge is not micromanagement but orchestration. This session presents a practical blueprint for governing this complex landscape securely and at scale. 

Key takeaways: 

•Orchestrate, don’t micromanage: Build an enterprise “central nervous system” to govern humans, bots, and AI agents.
•Trust & data by design: Enable adoption with AI trust layers (compliance, ethics, explainability) and quality data foundations.
•Shared governance: Balance CIO-led technical enablement with GPO-led business ownership for sustainable lifecycle management.

sessions.speaker: Janette Hausler (Speaker)
sessions.description: Get a first look at how AI25 winners are laying the foundation for agentic automation. Hear how they’re combining agents, robots, and people to drive real business impact—and reimagine what work can be with the UiPath Platform™ at the center.

sessions.speaker: Alex Phillips (Speaker)
sessions.description: Finding the right automation opportunities is often the hardest part of scaling. AI-powered Discovery with UiPath transforms how organizations identify, prioritize, and validate automation candidates—using data-driven insights instead of gut feel. In this roundtable, we’ll discuss how combining task mining, process mining, and generative AI accelerates discovery, uncovers hidden inefficiencies, and builds stronger automation pipelines. Join us to explore real-world approaches to making discovery faster, smarter, and aligned to business outcomes.

sessions.title: Unstructured Extraction: Tapping into New Data
sessions.speaker: Xavier Hanson (Speaker)
sessions.description: In this engaging roundtable, we’ll explore how agentic automation unlocks powerful business value from unstructured data hidden in narrative contracts, emails, and case notes. Learn how next-generation extraction techniques can surface critical insights previously trapped in text, enabling faster decisions, improved compliance, and new revenue opportunities. We’ll discuss real-world use cases where organizations have transformed raw narrative into actionable intelligence, powering downstream automations that streamline workflows, reduce risk, and enhance customer experiences. Join peers and industry experts to share ideas, identify untapped opportunities, and envision how agentic document processing can turn unstructured information into a strategic business asset.
